ca.ualberta.taskr

Class ViewTaskActivity

  • ca.ualberta.taskr.ViewTaskActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AcceptBidFragment.AcceptBidFragmentInteractionListener, EditBidFragment.EditBidFragmentInteractionListener

    public class ViewTaskActivity
implements EditBidFragment.EditBidFragmentInteractionListener, AcceptBidFragment.AcceptBidFragmentInteractionListener

    Displays all information for a selected task including title, location, and bids. Task Requesters can change the Task's status by either reopening or marking as done an assigned task. Requesters can also accept/decline bids. Task Providers can place bids with an inputted monetary amount.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      android.widget.Button addOrMarkButton
      Button for adding bid if requester or marking done if provider.

      android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView bidListView
      RecyclerView showing all non-declined bids on task.

      Button for deleting tasks

      Button for requester to modify task information.

      TextView displaying lowest bid amount on task.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewTaskActivity()
      Displays all information for a selected task including title, location, and bids. Task Requesters can change the Task's status by either reopening or marking as done an assigned task. Requesters can also accept/decline bids. Task Providers can place bids with an inputted monetary amount.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acceptedBid(Bid bid)
      Implemented method for stub in interface of class AcceptBidFragment. If Task' status is not DONE or ASSIGNED, updates both Task's chosen bidder to selected Bid's owner and Task's status to ASSIGNED before updating Task in ElasticSearch index. Task is then updated on server.
      void addBidOrMarkDone(android.view.View view)
      This method will either set the displayed Task's status to DONE if user is its Requester or allow user to add a bid to the Task otherwise using class EditBidFragment. If the user is a Requester trying to mark the task done, the task status will be changed iff the task is currently ASSIGNED. Otherwise, an class ErrorDialogFragment is shown. If the user is a provider trying to add a bid, the class EditBidFragment will be opened iff the task is open for bids (i.e. status is REQUESTED or BID). Otherwise, an class ErrorDialogFragment is shown.
      void bidAdd(double bidAmount)
      Implemented method for stub in interface of class EditBidFragment. Adds created Bid to displayed Task's list of Bids, then updates Task on server.
      void bidUpdate(double bidAmount, Bid originalBid)
      Implemented method for stub in interface of class EditBidFragment. Updates selected class Bid with modified amount, then updates Task on server.
      void declinedBid(Bid bid)
      Sets a selected class Bid to declined, then updates the task on server.
      void delete(android.view.View view)
      If user is requester and task status is REQUESTED or DONE, delete the task. Else, show an error message.
      void editTask()
      Starts class EditTaskActivity to allow requester to change their task's information and if the task has no bids (i.e. status is REQUESTED). If the status is not REQUESTED, display an class ErrorDialogFragment instead.
      android.widget.Button getAddOrMarkButton()
      Button for adding bid if requester or marking done if provider.

      class UserController for getting current user's username
      void onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, android.content.Intent data)
      Executed when class EditTaskActivity is finished. If the activity finished successfully, the modified task is returned.
      void onClickTaskImage()
      Starts an class PhotoGalleryActivity to display all the photos
      void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Initializes the MapBox mapview, obtains the displayTask, populates and displays list of all bids on tasks, and reformats ViewTaskActivity layout according to user type. Task to be displayed is obtained as a serialized class Task object. If requester, displays buttons for editing, reopening, or marking done the task. If provider only a button for adding bids is displaying.
      void onDestroy()
      Default onDestroy() method with corresponding mapView method added.
      void onLowMemory()
      Default onLowMemory method with corresponding mapView method added.
      void onMapClick(com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.geometry.LatLng point)
      On mapview click, shows task location in Google Maps. Adapted from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/42677389/android-how-to-pass-lat-long-route-info-to-google-maps-app/45554195#45554195
      void onMapReady(com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap mapboxMap)
      Initializes mapBoxMap attribute properties.

      Process button presses from the tool bar.

      Default onPause method with corresponding mapView method added.

      Default onSaveInstanceState() method with corresponding mapView method added.

      Default onStart() method with corresponding mapView method added.
      void onStop()
      Default onStop method with corresponding mapView method added.
      void reopen(android.view.View view)
      If displayed Task's status is ASSIGNED, update it to REQUESTED if it has no bids or BID otherwise. Remove Task's chosen bidder since Task is no longer assigned Once changes have been made, updates Task in ElasticSearch index. If the displayed Task's status is not ASSIGNED, show an class ErrorDialogFragment instead.

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)

        Initializes the MapBox mapview, obtains the displayTask, populates and displays list of all bids on tasks, and reformats ViewTaskActivity layout according to user type. Task to be displayed is obtained as a serialized class Task object. If requester, displays buttons for editing, reopening, or marking done the task. If provider only a button for adding bids is displaying.

        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState -
        See Also:
        class Task, MapBoxMap, class GenerateRetrofit

      • bidUpdate

        public void bidUpdate(double bidAmount,
                      Bid originalBid)

        Implemented method for stub in interface of class EditBidFragment. Updates selected class Bid with modified amount, then updates Task on server.

        Parameters:
        bidAmount - The new bid amount.
        originalBid - The previous bid before changes.
        See Also:
        class EditBidFragment, class Bid, class EditBidFragment

      • bidAdd

        public void bidAdd(double bidAmount)

        Implemented method for stub in interface of class EditBidFragment. Adds created Bid to displayed Task's list of Bids, then updates Task on server.

        Parameters:
        bidAmount - The new bid amount.
        See Also:
        class EditBidFragment, class EditBidFragment

      • declinedBid

        public void declinedBid(Bid bid)

        Sets a selected class Bid to declined, then updates the task on server.

        Parameters:
        bid - The bid to be declined.
        See Also:
        class Bid

      • acceptedBid

        public void acceptedBid(Bid bid)

        Implemented method for stub in interface of class AcceptBidFragment. If Task' status is not DONE or ASSIGNED, updates both Task's chosen bidder to selected Bid's owner and Task's status to ASSIGNED before updating Task in ElasticSearch index. Task is then updated on server.

        Parameters:
        bid - The class Bid to be accepted.
        See Also:
        class AcceptBidFragment, class AcceptBidFragment

      • taskAuthorClick

        public void taskAuthorClick()

        Opens class UserInfoFragment displaying task author's information when the task author's name is clicked.

        See Also:
        class UserInfoFragment, class UserInfoFragment

      • delete

        public void delete(android.view.View view)

        If user is requester and task status is REQUESTED or DONE, delete the task. Else, show an error message.

        Parameters:
        view -
        See Also:
        class ErrorDialogFragment, class GenerateRetrofit

      • addBidOrMarkDone

        public void addBidOrMarkDone(android.view.View view)

        This method will either set the displayed Task's status to DONE if user is its Requester or allow user to add a bid to the Task otherwise using class EditBidFragment. If the user is a Requester trying to mark the task done, the task status will be changed iff the task is currently ASSIGNED. Otherwise, an class ErrorDialogFragment is shown. If the user is a provider trying to add a bid, the class EditBidFragment will be opened iff the task is open for bids (i.e. status is REQUESTED or BID). Otherwise, an class ErrorDialogFragment is shown.

        Parameters:
        view -
        See Also:
        class EditBidFragment, class ErrorDialogFragment, class EditBidFragment, class ErrorDialogFragment, class EditBidFragment, class ErrorDialogFragment

      • reopen

        public void reopen(android.view.View view)

        If displayed Task's status is ASSIGNED, update it to REQUESTED if it has no bids or BID otherwise. Remove Task's chosen bidder since Task is no longer assigned Once changes have been made, updates Task in ElasticSearch index. If the displayed Task's status is not ASSIGNED, show an class ErrorDialogFragment instead.

        Parameters:
        view -
        See Also:
        class ErrorDialogFragment, class ErrorDialogFragment

      • editTask

        public void editTask()

        Starts class EditTaskActivity to allow requester to change their task's information and if the task has no bids (i.e. status is REQUESTED). If the status is not REQUESTED, display an class ErrorDialogFragment instead.

        See Also:
        class EditTaskActivity, class ErrorDialogFragment, class EditTaskActivity, class ErrorDialogFragment, class GenerateRetrofit

      • onActivityResult

        public void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                             int resultCode,
                             android.content.Intent data)

        Executed when class EditTaskActivity is finished. If the activity finished successfully, the modified task is returned.

        Parameters:
        requestCode -
        resultCode -
        data - Contains a string representing the modified task.
        See Also:
        class EditTaskActivity, class EditTaskActivity, class GenerateRetrofit
